name: Robber Rules
description: Robber Rules is a short, fact paced runner game, made for the 38th GMC game jam, where the theme was "three simple rules". Play as a robber who has been caught in the middle of his attempt to rob a bank, and now must try and outrun the police. However, it isn't easy with multiple obstacles in his way. Luckily, he has three special moves. He must use the correct move on the correct obstacle at the right time - or risk the police getting closer, and eventually, being caught. Rely on your reflexes.
